page.title: 06HEALTH 3
page.content:
{HEALTH VISITORS:}They weigh babies on a certain day of the week and also take care of the welfare of children until they leave school.
{CHIROPODIST:}One woman takes care of peoples' feet when they have got corns and athletes foot etc., and any other feet problems.
{SPEECH THERAPIST:}The therapist keeps in touch with the{health visitor,}who requests that the therapist sees the child with the lisp or any other speech impediment.
{SOCIAL SERVICES:}They do meals on wheels for the{elderly}in Towcester who live in{Meadow court, the alms {houses,}or at{Ridgeway house.
